section:
The snake slides off into the undergrowth having sunk its fangs in your ankle. Pain floods into your veins, icy cold and lava-like at the same time. To survive you must either
use up a blessing
of Immunity to Disease/Poison (if you have one)
or
suck out the poison by succeeding in
a SCOUTING roll at Difficulty 14 .
Survive Succumb
